Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_STELLA>
I came here to shop, but there's really not much
I'd care to buy. Well...better luck next time, I
suppose!

<NAME_MOB_STELLA>
I couldn't find what I was looking for, but I still
bought a lot more than I planned.

<NAME_MOB_STELLA>
YES! I finally found it! Exactly what I've been
looking for all this time! I need to go show it off
to my friends -- if you'll excuse me! ♪

<NAME_MOB_STELLA>
This town is well known for stocking just about
anything you can imagine. What a fantastic
place...

<NAME_MOB_STELLA>
Hello. Are you here to shop as well?

<NAME_MOB_STELLA>
Hmmm. I just can't decide. Which should I buy?

<NAME_MOB_STELLA>
It's so quiet around here. Seems like a positively
lovely place to live.

<NAME_MOB_STELLA>
Though small, I feel this town has a lot of
potential for greatness...

<NAME_MOB_STELLA>
I remember when this town was just a tiny little
burg. Watching it turn into this bustling
marketplace is like watching a dear child grow!

<NAME_MOB_STELLA>
This town is world-famous now, you know. Just
as I always knew it would be!
